key_risks: Regulatory and environmental risks due to stricter safety and environmental regulations
Economic sensitivity tied to cyclical industries like chemicals and petroleum
Competitive pressures in the railcar leasing market
Legal and financial concerns, including litigation and reliance on capital markets
controversies: Legal disputes, such as the case involving the Federal Employers' Liability Act (FELA)
Controversies related to employee benefits and severance pay, as seen in the Kotrosits v. GATX Corp. case
environmental_issues: Environmental impact of older railcar fleet not meeting current safety and environmental standards
social_issues: Employee morale and corporate reputation issues due to controversies over benefits and severance pay
governance_issues: Ethical concerns related to employee benefits and severance pay

sources.title: GATX - Wikipedia
